title: Trump administration axes Biden-era barrier for crypto in 401(k) plans
summary: The Trump administration rescinded Biden-era guidance warning employers to exercise caution before adding cryptocurrency and other digital assets to employee 401(k) plans
description: The Trump administration rescinded Biden-era guidance warning employers to exercise caution before adding cryptocurrency and other digital assets to employee 401(k) plans
